thread.title: Does Kylie Jenner Know How To Wear Coats? A Very Serious Investigation
thread.title_full: Does Kylie Jenner Know How To Wear Coats? A Very Serious Investigation

author: Erin Chack, Angelo Spagnolo
title: Does Kylie Jenner Know How To Wear Coats? A Very Serious Investigation
text:
View this image ›
instagram.com / Via Kylie Jenner We hope a closer look at the evidence will satisfy the question, “Does Kylie Jenner know how to wear coats?”
ID: 10347054 2. Exhibit A: No. View this image ›
instagram.com / Via Kylie Jenner Overwhelmed by the intricate process of wearing a coat, Kylie Jenner does her best impression of a coatrack, hoping it will trick onlookers.
ID: 10346738 3. Exhibit B: Not really. View this image ›
instagram.com / Via Kylie Jenner Here Kylie Jenner manages to get her arms into the sleeves — a huge improvement — still, the coat hangs off of her like a drugged-up python.
ID: 10346739 4. Exhibit C: Still no. View this image ›
instagram.com / Via Kylie Jenner Kylie Jenner attempts to distract onlookers from her coat inadequacies by gesturing to her hair. It doesn’t work.
ID: 10347648 5. EXHIBIT D: Where are your pants? View this image ›
instagram.com / Via Kylie Jenner In her extreme concentration to put on a coat, Kylie Jenner forgets one crucial step: pants.
ID: 10346743 6. Exhibit E: Again, no. View this image ›
instagram.com / Via Kylie Jenner Kylie Jenner’s coat slips off her arms like a greased-up shower curtain. The cries of children can be heard in the wind.
ID: 10346744 7. Exhibit F: No. View this image ›
instagram.com / Via Kylie Jenner Kylie Jenner attempts a look that can only be described as Construction Tarp Flapping Against the Side of a Building.
ID: 10346899 8. Exhibits G1 and G2: Maybe? Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @kyliejenner Kylie Jenner self-consciously tugs at a coat that looks like it ended up on her body by complete accident. The unwieldy coat makes onlookers nervous.
ID: 10347752 9. Exhibit H: Kind of. View this image ›
instagram.com / Via Kylie Jenner Kylie Jenner, embarrassed by her inability to keep a coat on both shoulders, hides her face behind her cell phone. Her shame is enormous.
ID: 10346994 10. Exhibit I: Almost! View this image ›
instagram.com / Via Kylie Jenner Kylie Jenner succeeds in keeping a coat halfway on. She stands very still as not to disturb it, the way one might act around a baby bird.
ID: 10346946 11. Exhibit J: No. :( View this image ›
instagram.com / Via Kylie Jenner In a huge set back, Kylie Jenner holds a coat adjacent to her body. And in the distance, sirens.
ID: 10346955 12. Exhibit K: Sort of! View this image ›
instagram.com / Via Kylie Jenner Kylie Jenner uses the sink to steady herself against the unfamiliar weight of a coat on her body. She takes a picture to commemorate the moment in her personal scrapbook.
ID: 10347047 13. Exhibit L: Nearly. View this image ›
instagram.com / Via Kylie Jenner Kylie Jenner takes a second to contemplate how many hours of practice have gone into getting her coat fully on. She thanks her coa(t)ch, off camera, for the many years of training.
ID: 10347014 14. Exhibit M: Yes!!! View this image ›
instagram.com / Via Kylie Jenner She can do it! She can wear a coat! Both shoulders are shod, her arms are armored. Kylie Jenner is wearing. A. Coat.
And the crowd goes wild.
ID: 10346958 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
